content: picot edge baby blanket berroco ultra wool handpaint 219 yds 2 skeins or worsted weight yarn 438 yds yardage note this blanket uses almost all the yardage if you plan on skipping gauge more yarn will more than likely be required needle size 7 4 5 mm size approx 22 x 22 before blocking 28 x 28 after blocking gauge 16 sts in garter stitch before blocking x 18 row = 4 14 5 - 15 sts in garter stitch after blocking x 15 row = 4 note about pattern count after every row to ensure correct number of sts and to keep the blanket shape stitch count has been given for every row blanket can be made bigger by continuing increase section if enlarging make sure to keep track of extra number of stitches in increase section the numbers will then need to be adjusted for turning row & decrease sections pattern row 5 bo1 kfb kfb k1 6 sts co 2 sts row 6 sl 1 k5 6 sts increase set-up section row 7 sl 1 k2 yo k to last st kfb 8 sts row 1 rs bobble 1 st kfb increase section k 1 st k the first half of the kfb row 8 bobble 1 k2 yo k to last st kfb pass the k st over the first half of kfb 9 13 17 21 25 29 33 37 41 45 49 53 complete the kfb 2 sts 57 61 65 69 73 77 81 85 89 93 97 101 row 2 ws sl 1 kfb 3 sts 105 109 113 117 121 125 sts row 3 sl 1 kfb kfb 5 sts row 9 bobble 1 k2 yo k to end row 4 bobble 1 k2 kfb 5 sts 9 13 17 21 25 29 33 37 41 45 49 53 this pattern is for personal use only not for resale ©2022 unwind yarn shop llc all rights reserved 9912 e grand river brighton mi 810-229-5579 www unwindyarnshopmi com 57 61 65 69 73 77 81 85 89 93 97 101 row 3 sl 1 k1 k2togtbl yo k2togtbl 105 109 113 117 121 125 sts k to end 120 116 112 108 104 100 96 92 88 84 row 10 sl 1 k2 yo k to end 80 76 72 68 64 60 56 52 48 44 40 36 10 14 18 22 26 30 34 38 42 46 50 54 32 28 24 20 16 12 8 58 62 66 70 74 78 82 86 90 94 98 102 106 110 114 118 122 sts row 4 sl 1 k1 k2togtbl yo k2togtbl k to last st kfb row 11 sl 1 k2 yo k to last st kfb 120 116 112 108 104 100 96 92 88 84 12 16 20 24 28 32 36 40 44 48 52 56 80 76 72 68 64 60 56 52 48 44 40 36 60 64 68 72 76 80 84 88
